DOC.brief_summary: The purpose randomize , control , prospective study evaluate benefit combine aerobic exercise cognitive training optimize cognitive function . The study enroll 109 men woman , age 55-75 year stable health without contraindication exercise evidence dementia cognitive impairment . Individuals randomly assign one four group six month : Aerobic Exercise Health Education , Home Exercise Cognitive Training , Aerobic Exercise Cognitive Training , Home Exercise Health Education . Participants undergo measurement cognitive function , physical performance , complete questionaires daily activity , physical activity , quality life baseline ( pre-intervention ) , 6 12 month baseline .
DOC.brief_title: Combining Exercise Cognitive Training Improve Everyday Function
